Absolutely! I'm always looking for a new adventure
I love it! Getting to explore different cultures and landscapes is always so exciting
Yes, I'm a bit of a wanderlust
Absolutely, I try to do a big trip every year

anchor: What is your favorite song to dance to?
Who is your favorite author?
What job would you choose if money was no object?
What do you think the world will look like in 100 years?
targets: A much more technologically advanced world
A world that is much more interconnected
A world with much higher levels of sustainability
A world that has successfully eliminated poverty
A world in which space exploration is commonplace

anchor: What is the last place you traveled to?
What is one thing you would want to do before you die?
What do you think sets you apart from the rest?
targets: My determination to strive for excellence

anchor: What do you think makes a good leader?
What have you done to challenge yourself lately?
How do you deal with disagreements?
targets: I try to talk it out
I take a step back and look at the bigger picture
I take the time to fully understand the other person
I look for ways to compromise
I focus on finding a solution that works for both sides

anchor: How do you think technology will shape the future?
What does creativity mean to you?
targets: A way to express my ideas
An innovative approach to solving problems
A way to escape from reality
A way to discover new possibilities

anchor: What do you consider your best quality?
What experience made you most proud?
What is the one piece of advice you would share with the world?
targets: Don't be afraid to take risks

anchor: What is the weirdest thing you've done?
targets: Spent a night camping in the woods

anchor: What is the craziest adventure you've ever embarked on?
What is something unusual you learned recently?

targets: Overcoming limitations in language and communication

anchor: Do you see failure as a learning opportunity or a dead end?
targets: A chance to try something new

anchor: If money weren't an issue, where would you go and why?
targets: Safari – to experience African wildlife in its natural habitat
Costa Rica – to partake in its various outdoor and environmental activities
India – to witness its unique culture
Norway – to explore its natural beauty

anchor: Are you an introvert or an extrovert?
Do you think there are more opportunities for growth in big cities or more rural areas?
How do you measure success?
What is your biggest ambition?
targets: To make a lasting contribution to humanity
To create something that will be remembered for generations
To create something that will revolutionize society
To make a difference in the lives of others

anchor: What would you do with unlimited money?
targets: Invest in technology to improve the quality of life
Donate to charities that support the environment
Launch a startup that solves global issues

anchor: How would your friends describe you?

targets: No - I am an only child

anchor: What is the best vacation you have ever taken?

targets: The height of the Roman Empire

targets: Growing and evolving as a person

anchor: When did you last travel abroad?

targets: Life is 10% what happens to you, and 90% how you react to it.
If you want to go fast, go alone; if you want to go far, go together.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Don't limit your challenges; challenge your limits.
